Class level method which allows you update all rows that matches your specified condition. The number of affected rows will be returned.

|| *Name* || *Required* || *Type* || *Default* || *Description* ||
|| updates || yes || string || "" || the `SET` part of the query ||
|| conditions || no || string || "" || conditions for the `WHERE` part of the query ||

{{{
<cfset records_returned = model("category").updateAll(updates="active=1", conditions="name='Wheels Tutorials'")>
}}}
{{{
<cfset model("user").updateAll(admin=1)>
}}}
